Question
========

A sample has the following outcomes: 12, 31, 15, 8, 24. How large is the sample variance of these numbers?

Answerlist
----------

* 9.35
* 17.5
* 70
* 87.5

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 9.35: Incorrect
* 17.5: Incorrect
* 70: Incorrect
* 87.5: Correct
